products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consist of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope. (FOR HYDRANT SYSTEM)
products_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, column depth: 4.5 mtr, speed: 1450 RPM
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electrical motor, coupling: TEFC motor, accessories: all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor, application: hydrant system

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, centrifugal horizontal type, with gland packing capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories and complete set shall mounted on common base frame. The quoted rate shall include fixing of coupling, coupling guard and foudation bolts etc. Civil foundation will be client's scope.(FOR HYDRANT SYSTEM)
products_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, speed: 1450 RPM
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electrical motor, coupling: TEFC motor, mounting: common base frame, packing: gland packing, accessories: coupling, coupling guard, foundation bolts, application: hydrant system

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consists of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope. (FOR SPRINKLER SYSTEM)

products_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electrical motor, coupling: TEFC motor, accessories: all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor, application: sprinkler system

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of diesel engine driven standby pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consists of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with diesel engine of suitable HP with speed of 1500 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with engine. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope.
products_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, column depth: 4.5 mtr, speed: 1500 RPM
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: diesel engine, coupling: diesel engine, accessories: all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with engine

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection,testing & commissioning of diesel engine driven stand by pump, centrifugal horizontal type with gland packing and capable  of delivering 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall be coupled to suitable HP of Diesel Engine radiator water cooled type having speed of 1500 RPM with all accessories including diesel engine control panel and complete set shall be mounted on common base frame.Other accessories viz Batteries & battery leads with stand, fuel tank(for 4 hrs operation) with stand and gauge glass, fuel piping with valves etc to be supplied. The quoted rate shall include radiator water cooling piping(if required), coupling guard and other standard accessories, RCC foundation(as recommended by manufacturer) and foundation bolts, etc, complete ( civil foundation shall be client's scope).
products_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, speed: 1500 RPM
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: diesel engine, cooling: radiator water cooled, mounting: common base frame, packing: gland packing, accessories: diesel engine control panel, batteries & battery leads with stand, fuel tank(for 4 hrs operation) with stand and gauge glass, fuel piping with valves, radiator water cooling piping, coupling guard, RCC foundation, foundation bolts

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of electric motor driven Jockey Pump,VERTICAL TURBINE type capable to deliver 25 M3/HR at 105 MWC.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electric motor

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of electric motor driven Jockey Pump,centrifugal horizontal type capable to deliver 25 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall coupled to TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 2900 RPM with all accessories mounted on common base frame.
products_entries.size: capacity: 25 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, speed: 2900 RPM
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electric motor, coupling: TEFC motor, mounting: common base frame

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of compartmentalised common control panel for above pumps  as per technical specification attached with this tender document. All components shall be housed in a common cubicals made of 16 swg. M.S. sheet with required stiffners(if required). The panel shall be powder coated of approved colour both inside and out side. The panel shall have both bottom and top cable entry provisions and panel shall be mounted on pedestal of 300mm height.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: application: for above pumps, material: M.S.(mild steel) sheet, finish: powder coated, entry provisions: bottom and top cable entry, mounting: pedestal, construction: common cubicals, stiffners: as required

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, laying, testing & commissioning of FRLS, PVC outer sheath, steel armoured, aluminium / copper conductor, 1100 Volt Grade power cables with gland etc for above pumps. The cable shall be laid in tray / hume pipe / in trenches / on walls / floors etc as required. Cables laid out doors shall include the price of earth escavation providing brick and sand protection, refilling and compacting the earth.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: FRLS(fire retardant low smoke), sheath: PVC outer sheath, armouring: steel armoured, conductor: aluminium or copper, accessories: gland, laying: tray, hume pipe, trenches, walls, floors, outdoor protection: brick and sand protection, refilling, compacting

products_entries.full_product_description: GI earthing strips of 50mm x 6mm thick, strips shall run on floor / ceiling / walls, from pump to control panel with necessary accessories as required.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: GI(galvanized iron), application: from pump to control panel, accessories: as required

products_entries.full_product_description: 25 Sq.mm single core multistrand copper cable shall be run on floor / ceiling / walls, from the nearest earth bar to the pump control panel with necessary accessories as required.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: core: single, type: multistrand, material: copper, application: from nearest earth bar to pump control panel, accessories: as required

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply and installation of pressure gauge, 1/2 inch bottom entry, of suitable range with ball valves and other accessories.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: range: suitable, accessories: ball valves and other accessories, entry: bottom

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply and installation of double flanged vertical air vessel fabricated from M.S. Plate with dished ends (M.S. plate to be of required thickness to sustain the indicated test pressure), one standard pressure tight manhole, painted inside with bitumastic or anti-corrosive paint and outside with one coast of primer and two coats of synthetic enamel paint complete with approved quality of pressure switches, pressure gauge and all other required accessories to operate commonly main/sprinkler/diesel fire pump & jockey pump at drop of pressure, automatically at required pressure setting (Air vessel, pressure switch, pressure gauge, air release valve, piping and accessories to suit the pressure requirement of individual pressure zone)
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: flange-type: double flanged, orientation: vertical, material: m.s.(mild steel) plate, end-type: dished ends, plate-thickness: required thickness to sustain indicated test pressure, manhole: standard pressure tight, internal-paint: bitumastic or anti-corrosive paint, external-paint: one coat of primer and two coats of synthetic enamel paint, accessories: pressure switches, pressure gauge, air release valve, piping and accessories to suit pressure requirement of individual pressure zone, operation: automatic at required pressure setting, application: for main/sprinkler/diesel fire pump & jockey pump at drop of pressure

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 & 7 mm Heavy grade conforming to IS : 3589 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope. 350 mm NB x 7 mm thk
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(black steel), grade: heavy, thickness: 7 mm, standard: indian standard 3589 part -1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, joints: grooved with groove coupling, civil work: all related civil work, supports etc of vendor's scope

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of SS 4 way collecting head with 63 mm dia instantaneous type inlet 150 dia flanged outlet with built in check valve for fire brigade connection to fire reservoir (IS : 904).
products_entries.size: inlet diameter: 63 mm, outlet diameter: 150 mm
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ss(stainless steel), inlet-type: instantaneous, outlet-type: flanged, feature: built in check valve, application: fire brigade connection to fire reservoir, standard: indian standard 904

products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ss(stainless steel), accessories: necessary foot valve, application: for reservoir

products_entries.full_product_description: Priming arrangement of 8000ltrs capacity for negative suction to be provided by the erection vendor including necessary tank and other structural support. Valves required are indicated elsewhere.
